name: Ballue's Gravity Grind
description:
A collectathon game with a grappling hook where gravity itself is an obstacle!

Features:

- 5 different levels

- AAA level cutscene technology

- Grappling hook fun

- Infinite terrain/obstacle generation

- Some enemies

- Local high scores

Controls:

- WASD or arrow keys to move.

- Left Mouse Button to use grappling hook.

- Shift and Right Mouse Button to control tail/grapple length.

- F to toggle full-screen.

- R to restart level

- Escape to return the the main menu or exit. Your progress is saved.

Other Info:

- Ballue makes a return from Leap Of Faith!

- He still has his goofy bursting animation.

- Have fun!
